Weaver Making Plays Again
Titans second-year OLB Rashad Weaver flashed during his rookie year during the preseason, and he put himself in a position to help the team a year ago. But an injury ended … [+1854 chars]

articles.author: Corey Pronman
articles.title: Pronman: 2022 World Juniors standouts and disappointments - The Athletic
articles.description: Corey Pronman takes a look at the prospects who stood out and those who fell short at the 2022 IIHF World Junior Championship in Edmonton.
articles.content: After a week in Red Deer for the Hlinka Gretzky, it was off to Edmonton for the rescheduled 2022 IIHF World Junior Championship. Here is a summary of players who I felt stood out or failed to stand o… [+9249 chars]

articles.title: BYU Cougars football: Jacob Conover, offense play well in scrimmage - Deseret News
articles.description: Focus was on the twos and threes in an 80-play scrimmage at LaVell Edwards Stadium, head coach Kalani Sitake said Saturday, praising the offense’s execution
articles.content: Jaren Hall was named BYUs starting quarterback for the opener against Arizona a year ago this week, and did nothing throughout the entire 2021 season to lose that role, aside from sustaining some inj… [+4621 chars]
